price: 71. Mas si (después de dejarlos en libertad) pretenden traicionarte, (debes saber que) ya traicionaron a Al-lah con anterioridad (al no creer en Él) y Al-lah os dio poder sobre ellos (y los vencisteis); y Al-lah es Omnisciente y Sabio.
arabic: وَإِن يُرِيدُواْ خِيَانَتَكَ فَقَدۡ خَانُواْ ٱللَّهَ مِن قَبۡلُ فَأَمۡكَنَ مِنۡهُمۡۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-in yurīdū khiyānataka faqad khānū al-laha min qablu fa-amkana min'hum wal-lahu ʿalīmun ḥakīmun
